text: Imana itanga akarorero k’umushumvyi atunzwe na Sebuja nawe ataco yishoboje, n’uwundi nawe tukaba twamuhaye imigisha myiza ivuye kuri twebwe, nawe akaba atanga muri iyo migisha mumwiherero canke k’umugaragaro, none abo bantu barangana ikenguruko ryose ni ry’Imana, mugabo benshi muribo ntavyo bazi
